org.programus.nxj.rockboy.core.thing
Class Thing

java.lang.Object
  org.programus.nxj.rockboy.core.thing.Thing
Direct Known Subclasses:
BouncyBall, InelasticBall
public abstract class Thing
extends Object

This is a class to describe a thing in the NXTRockBoy.

It has a multi-coordinate position and a speed, which is a vector. It also have an image to display on screen.

Author:
Programus
